Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that George W. Bush confirmed how dishonest the mainstream media can be and publicly said that he doesn't approve of what they have been saying about Donald Trump. This is not supported by the actual interview and is a misrepresentation of what Bush said.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misrepresentation of what the former president said a year ago.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that George W. Bush's statement confirms the dishonesty of the mainstream media and his disapproval of their treatment of Donald Trump, which is not supported by the actual interview.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that George W. Bush was discussing the challenges of unifying the country in the context of a divided news media landscape, rather than confirming the dishonesty of the mainstream media or expressing disapproval of their treatment of Donald Trump.
